nodes.text: Mee'r was the most populated of the three continents on the agriworld Draenell's Point. The West Unillian Mountains was located on the continent, as well as five major cities; the capital, Wullerton; the civilian spaceport, Starpoint; Jhepar, Thulpin City, and Uniqer. The continent's population numbered twenty-nine million. Five million lived in Wullerton, three million in Starpoint, and one million each in Jhepar, Thulpin City, and Uniqer.
